claim: Terminator Genisys is not a soft reboot of the film series.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The fifth installment in the Terminator franchise , it serves as a soft reboot to the film series that features the main characters from the first two films , portrayed by a new cast with the exception of Arnold Schwarzenegger , who reprises his role as the eponymous character .

claim: Terminator Genisys is not a soft reboot of the film series.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Welsh born English actor Christian Bale portrays 33-year-old Connor in the film series 's fourth installment , Terminator Salvation , and Australian actor Jason Clarke portrays a 44-year-old Connor , who becomes the T-3000 and serves as the antagonist of the film series 's fifth installment , Terminator Genisys .
